casebody.data:
MacREYNOLDS v. CONEY ISLAND & B. R. CO. (Supreme Court, Appellate Division, Second Department. November 12, 1915.) Appeal from Special Term, Kings County. Action by Scott MacReynolds against the Coney Island & Brooklyn Railroad Company. From an order setting aside the verdict and granting plaintiff new trial, defendant appeals. Order reversed, and verdict reinstated.

Argued before JENKS, P. J., and STAPLETON, MILLS, RICH, and PUTNAM, JJ.

PER CURIAM.

Order reversed, with costs, and verdict unanimously reinstated, on authority of Frances MacReynolds v. Coney Island & Brooklyn Railroad Company, 155 N. Y. Supp. 655, decided herewith.
